name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SignalSurf: Assess WiFi on Booking & Airbnb

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant WiFi ratings for Booking.com & Airbnb. Travel with confidence; stay connected.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"SignalSurf is your essential Chrome extension for seamless travels and remote work. Designed for the modern digital nomad, remote worker, and the avid traveler, SignalSurf provides immediate insights into the WiFi strength of accommodations listed on platforms like Airbnb and Booking.com.

No more sifting through countless reviews or enduring disappointing internet connections. Our tool harnesses real user data and comprehensive WiFi tests to give you reliable and accurate WiFi ratings at a glance. 

With SignalSurf, you can confidently book your next stay, knowing you're equipped with the best internet connectivity data available. Elevate your booking experience, stay connected, and ensure productivity, no matter where your journey takes you."
